abstract.t: This document defines a content sharing usage for REsource LOcationAnd Discovery (RELOAD). The content sharing usage provides thefunctionality of distributing and fetching shared content to and froma P2P overlay network. The shared content including such asstreaming media, files etc. are provided by those shared contentservice providers. Using content sharing usage of RELOAD canconstruct a peer-to-peer overlay, the overlay performs as ContentDelivery Network and is service insensitive.
